li.a: Weatherly Receives "Thank You" for Veteran's Birthday Bash
Title 1 Comprehensive Needs Assessment for Parents
Faculty Member of the Month Nominations

span.style: margin: 0px;
margin: 0px;
margin: 0px; line-height: 118%; font-size: 14pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
background-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.strong: School is closed until further notice. Offices are by appointment only. Please email me if you would like to set up an appointment at youngt@weatherlysd.org

span.style: margin: 0px; line-height: 118%; font-size: 24pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);

strong.span:
Weatherly Area School District is offering
Free Breakfast and Lunch

span.style: margin: 0px; line-height: 118%; font-size: 14pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
margin: 0px; line-height: 118%; font-size: 14pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);

p.span: Starting Tuesday, March 17, all caregivers and families may drive-thru and pick-up meals for their children. Lunch and breakfast for the following day will be provided on a first come, first serve basis.

span.style: margin: 0px; line-height: 118%; font-size: 16pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);

strong.span: Meals will be given to children 18 and under

span.style: margin: 0px; line-height: 118%; font-size: 14pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
margin: 0px; line-height: 118%; font-size: 14pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
margin: 0px; line-height: 118%; font-size: 14pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
span.span: Lunches will include sandwiches, fresh vegetables, fruit and milk. Cereal and other assorted breakfast items, along with a fruit, juice and milk will be provided for breakfast. No congregating at the location is permitted.

span.style: margin: 0px; line-height: 150%; font-size: 24pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);

strong.span:
Location & Time
Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays

span.style: margin: 0px; line-height: 150%; font-size: 14pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);

p.span:
Weatherly Area Elementary School
602 Sixth Street
Weatherly, PA 18255

span.style: margin: 0px; line-height: 150%; font-size: 14pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(227, 108, 9);
margin: 0px; line-height: 118%; font-size: 14pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;

p.br: Click here to see the daily breakfast and lunch menus.

a.title: Safe To Say Something Anonymous Reporting System

br.a: Safe To Say Something Anonymous Reporting System

span.style: text-align: left; text-transform: none; line-height: 24px; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: inline !important; white-space: normal; orphans: 2; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal; float: none; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 192, 0);

div.span: SAD FACT: #Pennsylvania has largest gap between the poorest and wealthiest districts. Please sign on & RT, if you want @GovernorTomWolf, @PAHouseGOP, @PaHouseDems, @PaSenateDems, @PASenateGOP to FULLY FUND PA PUBLIC SCHOOLS #PABudget. #WeWorkforFunding

span.style: font-size: 16px;

a.style: text-align: left; color: rgb(0, 124, 137); text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; font-family: Helvetica; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: underline; word-spacing: 0px; white-space: normal; orphans: 2; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: transparent;
